BSP Live Series.title: BSP Live Series: 2021​​​​-​​​09​​​​-​​​​04 Kharkiv
BSP Live Series.label: Broken Spine Productions
BSP Live Series.about:
A live recording of a performance at LF Club in Kharkiv, Ukraine from September 04, 2021. Live sound and recording by Vlad Rybalkin. Digital only release from Broken Spine Productions (BSPLS23).
A first round of donations went to The Kyiv Independent, Ukraine’s English-language media outlet, because reliable independent media coverage is critical:
kyivindependent.com
Further donations will go to Ukraine-Hilfe Berlin who provide medical and humanitarian aid to victims of the war:
www.ukraine-hilfe-berlin.de
Or please check this Linktree for other donation options:
linktr.ee/voiceforukraine
BSP Live Series.credits:
released February 27, 2022
Aidan Baker - guitar, drum machine
Leah Buckareff - bass

BSP Live Series.title: BSP Live Series: 2023​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​-​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​01​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​-​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​26 Berlin
BSP Live Series.label: Broken Spine Productions
BSP Live Series.about:
A live recording of a performance at The Institut für Erziehungswissenschaften der Humboldt-Universität in Berlin, Germany on January 26, 2023. Digital only release from Broken Spine Productions (BSPLS28).
This performance was part of a research seminar led by Prof. Dr. Malte Brinkmann with the title "Die ästhetische und pädagogische Darstellung der Welt: Zeigen, Fragen, Fühlen“ (The Aesthetic and Pedagogical Presentation of The World: Showing, Asking, Feeling), organized by the Chair for General Pedagogy of the Department of Education Studies at the Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin.
Concert organized and facilitated by Johannes Türstig. Video by Daniel Pastenaci, processed by the band.
Higher res video available here:  youtu.be/6Uu11Rrlz9Y
BSP Live Series.credits:
released March 3, 2023
Aidan Baker - guitar
Leah Buckareff - bass

trackinfo.title: Untitled Drone -or- A Lecture In Sonic Phenomenology
trackinfo.label: Broken Spine Productions

BSP Live Series.title: BSP Live Series: 2023​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​-​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​03​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​-​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​26 Berlin
BSP Live Series.label: Broken Spine Productions
BSP Live Series.about:
A live recording of a performance at Arkaoda in Berlin, Germany on March 26, 2023, part of a series of concerts hosted by Karlrecords. Digital only release from Broken Spine Productions (BSPLS29).
Cover photo by Udo Siegfriedt.
BSP Live Series.credits:
released April 7, 2023
Aidan Baker - guitar
